pullrequest.title: Fix $Revision$ version reporting with Segway version

content.raw:
The `__init__.py` file itself or `version.py`?

`version.py` is used strictly so that so that `run.py` can import the version as well. Technically you could `import __init__` in `run.py` but that seems like a bad idea.

I imported the version in `__init__.py` since it doesn't "break" existing functionality in using `import segway` to find the version. There is a small chance this is used by others from older versions (though admittedly very doubtfully).
